District Five
=============

George Chase

Term Expires May 2025

* Email
  [ccouncil5@wacotx.gov](mailto:ccouncil5@wacotx.gov "Compose an email to ccouncil5@wacotx.gov")
  
George Chase is a native of Waco who joined the council in June of 2024 after being appointed to fill the vacant District V seat. A graduate of Waco High School and Vanderbilt University, he is the President of Insurors of Texas. Since moving back to Waco in 1994, George has served on numerous city and non-profit boards.

![Councilmember Chase](https://www.waco-texas.com/files/sharedassets/public/v/4/government/images/chase.jpg?dimension=pageimage&w=480)

[Back to top](https://www.waco-texas.com/Government/City-Council/District-Five#body-top)
